value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC GAME - Serral vs SKillous!
value.excerpt: Awesome game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and SKillous (Protoss). In this 40+ minute long match we see Brood Lords, Ultralisks, Infestors, Vipers, Lurkers, Zerglings and more from the Zerg.
